page.title: 04The Dalston Show
page.content: In 1980 the Dalston show had 1009 enteries and in 1979 they had 883 enteries.This year all the entries have to be in by June 29th.It is held on the Dalston show field,It is on for 9 hours but there is a disco from 9pm to midnight.Also at the show there was a craft exhibition and lots of vintage machinery there is a shopping area and tug of war plus trade stand.There are only 2 show rings.They sell neckleses and penknives and toys.There is a childrens section and the judges are Mrs A.V.Dyke and Mrs Bennett.There's a beer tent and a cattle ring for goats, sheep,cows,bulls.We hope you enjoy it if you come.
